main: When her passive is active, she follows up with a free S1 whenever an ally staggers an enemy (once per turn). This S1 gives her an additional {status:Vibration} Count and triggers a {status:VibrationExplosion} on its last coin.
Transfers {status:Vibration} Count from herself to her target with S2.
Consumes {status:Vibration} Count on her S3 to gain Coin Power.
other: Gains 2 {status:Vibration} Count on all skills. S1 generates additional Count based on the target's Count (max 4).

1040901.desc:
- When an other ally Staggers an enemy with an attack: follow up with a Skill 1 against the Staggered enemy. (once per Turn)
- If multiple enemies are Staggered at once, target the enemy with the least HP(for Abnormalities, target the Abnormality with the least HP; then, target the Part with the least HP).
- When using Skill 1 with this effect, this unit gains +1 more [Vibration] Count from its Coin effects, and triggers a [VibrationExplosion] with the last Coin On Hit
1040901.name: N.O.

1040921.desc: #1 Deployed ally gains +1 more [Vibration] Count from their Skill or Coin effects (2 times per turn)
1040921.name: The A.I.

descs: [OnSucceedAttack] Gain [Vibration] Count equal to (([Vibration] Count on target)/2) (max 2)
[OnSucceedAttack] Gain [Vibration] Count equal to (([Vibration] Count on target)/2) (max 3)
